name: Billiard Pool Pro 2015
description:
Now play Billiard and become a master in Pool Games. This game contains full high quality 3D graphics. This game contains two playing mode one is practice mode and the second one is two player mode. In practice mode you can learn and play game as a single player and you can play complete game and handle is completely. In two player mode you can play against your friend which you select.
Features:
Play Practice mode.
Play 2 player mode.

Billiard is a cue sport that is typically played on a table with pockets situated in each of the four corners and a further two, commonly referred to as the middle, or side pockets, that sit in the middle of each of the long side cushions.
Download it and install it on your smart phone and you really love it.
